content: One of the most original social media which everybody loves. Waiting for more people to join in and support our dreams to create a better society
name: Manikya Sharma

content: A must for students of today's generation. Stusome has become a platform unlike others, providing all the features which a student needs.
name: Nikhil Sharma

content: Stusome is more than just a brand, it is an environment for cooperation among students. Let us commence an era where social media is more than distraction but support for students.
name: Lavya Thapar
